page.title: 19A Day in the Life of Judith.
page.content: My name is Judith Baird.I am 11 years old.On Thursday morning I woke up at 8am and saw my older sisters off to High School in Biggar.I hurried downstairs,had a plate of cornflakes for my breakfast,brushed my teeth and hair and set off for school.The bell rang at 9am.We did some Maths and Language work until playtime at 10:45am when we played skipping.We then had our P.E.lesson,when we played rounders.I went home for lunch at 12:30pm and then played skipping again until the bell went at 1:30pm.In the afternoon we did project work and at 3:30pm went home.I got changed and went for my piano lesson to Symington. I returned home and had tea.When I had finished,I washed my hair ready to go to an accordian concert at 7pm.I came home at 11:30pm and went to bed.
